data.name: Open Hearts
data.description: Open Hearts is a browser based. open source, game of Hearts! It's coded using JavaScript, Node.js, and couchDB. The backend was done using KOA and the front end is react.js. There are a couple other goodies in there such as Handlebars, socket.io, eslint for formatting, and mocha/chai/instanbul for TDD.

data.name: PokemonGo-Map-EasyStart
data.description: This utility was made with C# and WPF. It was made as an easier way for people to start the PokemonGo-Map using Python. Since you had to type in the command to command line, I saw an opportunity to make a quit streamlined app for people who weren't as technically advanced!

data.name: The Last Stand
data.description: The Last Stand is a game being developed under ThouCurator. It's a 3D, top down, 3rd person mech shooter. It's being developed using C#, Unity3D, and SQL Server
